name: Authentication
shortDescription: Master user identity and security on the web and in the cloud.
longDescription: Solve the most common authentication problems, and master the fundamentals of how authentication on the web actually works, with technologies like cookies, JWT, basic and Oauth 2 protocols.

name: Performance
shortDescription: Diagnose and resolve real world performance issues in web applications.
longDescription: Learn how to implement the most popular performance patterns by solving real world performance challenges.

name: Authorization
shortDescription: Understand the problem of secure access control in web and cloud applications.
longDescription: Implement the most popular authorization strategies such as RBAC, ABAC and ACL. Learn how to solve enterprise level authorization problems into your applications.

name: Payments
shortDescription: How web applications send and receive money on the internet securely.
longDescription: Implement practical payment solutions with multiple providers such as Paystack, Stripe, Flutterwave, including crypto payment.

name: Product engineering
shortDescription: Solve problems related to product growth and user insights.
longDescription: Implement solutions to product problems such as product analytics, feature flags, A/B testing, and customer support.

name: File and Media management
shortDescription: Build reliable applications that upload and download files and assets.
longDescription: Solve the unique problem of transferring large amounts of data such as videos, images, pausing and resuming file uploads.

name: Developer experience
shortDescription: Solve developer specific questions, and master the most common build tools.
longDescription: Become the star on your team that implements the code quality workflows and ensures the best developer experiences. Master tools like eslint, CI & CD, build tools, commit hooks, and custom build scripts.

name: User Interfaces
shortDescription: Create engaging user experiences that match the spefications of user designers.
longDescription: Implement pixel perfect UI designs from Figma prototypes, create engaging animations and user interactions, and create reusable components for design systems.
